text: It's been tough, Jane. I've finally made the decision to break up. It's hard thinking about starting over, especially considering my unique gender identity. Not everyone understands, and it feels daunting.
I think we're heading towards a breakup. Things have been really strained, and it feels like we're not on the same page anymore.
Had another argument last night. It's becoming clear that we want different things. Feeling lost.
Feeling a bit better today. Trying to focus on the positives and what I can control. Thanks for being there for me.
I'm feeling really down lately. My relationship is on the rocks, and I'm not sure how to navigate the conversation.
